Package arima

Class AR

java.lang.Object
arima.AR
Direct Known Subclasses:
ARMA
public class AR extends Object
Class to solve an AR-Model using a linear regression
Author:
Christoph Barkey, Andrej Muschke

  • Constructor Details

    • AR

      public AR(int p)
      Constructor for an AR-Model. Only uses p as input.
      Parameters:
      p - order p for AR polynomial

  • Method Details

    • fitModel

      public void fitModel(Observation[] observations, double probTrain)
      Wrapper function that includes data preparation steps, parameter estimations and evaluation.
      Parameters:
      observations - array of observations
      probTrain - probability of training data [0,1]

    • setPrevPValues

      protected void setPrevPValues(Observation[] observations)
      Set p previous observation values for every Observation there t>p
      Parameters:
      observations -

    • createOLSData

      protected void createOLSData(Observation[] observations)
      Method to create OLSData-array. Considering prevPValues. Format: (y_1, x_11, x_12, ... ,x_1p, y_n, x_n1, x_n2,...,x_np)
      Parameters:
      observations - array of observations

    • estPara

      protected void estPara(int numObs, int numPara)
      Takes the previously created input data from data, estimates the regression parameters, and stores them into estPara
      Parameters:
      numObs - number of observations
      numPara - number of parameters

    • storePhiHat

      protected void storePhiHat()
      Stores the intercept and AR parameters separately into the respective fields intercept and phiHat

    • storePrediction

      protected void storePrediction(Observation[] observations)
      Creates actual predictions and stores them into the respective field prediction. Then setError is invoked, calculating, and storing the results in error
      Parameters:
      observations - array of observations

    • predict

      protected double predict(Observation observation)
      Separate predict function, to calculate predicted value based on prevPValues and PsiHat
      Parameters:
      observation - array of observations
      Returns:
      predicted value for observation

    • calcSSE

      protected void calcSSE(Observation[] observations)
      Method to calculate the error measurements. train/test SSE/MSE
      Parameters:
      observations - array of observations

    • printResult

      public void printResult()
      Method to print the relevant data of an AR model. Prints the order p, n, the parameter values and the model performance measures

    • forecast

      public Observation[] forecast(Observation[] observations, int h, boolean all)
      Method to forecast the h next steps Creates forecast values and prints them directly. The user can decide if he/she wants to store all observations or only the forecasts.
      Parameters:
      observations - array of Observations
      h - periods to forecast
      all - if true -> return observation + forecasts
      Returns:
      forecast or observations + forecasts

    • addObservation

      protected static Observation[] addObservation(Observation[] observations, Observation newObservation)
      Helper function, to add an observation to an array of observations and return the new array.
      Parameters:
      observations - array of Observations
      newObservation - observation to add
      Returns:
      enhanced array of observations
